name: Royal Skedaddle
description:
Find a way to escape using the fairy’s gift!

Dina is the young heiress of the Ganlir's kingdom throne. However she has no desire to inherit it. There is only one thing this 11 year old princess wants: To explore the world with her own two feet. However her father, Alder Ganlir, doesn't allow her to leave the palace and locks Dina in her room at night. However, one night a fairy visited her room and gifted her a magic stone that allows her to teleport to it! Now that Dina has the power to escape she will have to stealth through the patrolling guards and solving puzzles to open doors. But there are many ways to exit the palace, which one will she choose?

Key Features:

  • Puzzle like Stealth

             Royal Skedaddle will center around its stealth.  The rooms are designed in a way, that each one will feel like solving a puzzle trying to figure out what is the best way to get through it!

  • Magic Rock

             The magic rock given to Dina will play a major part in the game’s design, being a crucial part of solving some of the rooms and puzzles around the palace!

  • Unique Puzzles

                Although stealth will be the focus, the puzzles spread throughout the game will feel unique and challenging!

  • Freedom of exploration

                You are given the freedom to explore how you want to and use any way you can to roam the palace!

Controls:

Keyboard and Mouse:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Interact: E
  • Crouch: Left Control
  • Map: Tab or M
  • Quests/Inventory Menu: Q
  • Pause Menu: ESC
  • Throw Rock/ Teleport to Rock: LMB
  • Recall Rock: RMB

Gamepad:

  • Movement: Left Stick
  • Interact: X
  • Crouch: L1
  • Map: R2
  • Quests/Inventory Menu: Touchpad
  • Pause Menu: Options Button
  • Throw Rock: R1
  •  Teleport to Rock: Triangle
  • Recall Rock: Circle

Development Team:

  • Pedro Soares, Game Designer
  • Francisco Neves, Game Programmer
  • Ricardo Santos, Game Artist
